STATE OF MICHIGAN
DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH AND HUMAN SERVICES
GRETCHEN WHITMER ROBERT GORDON
LANSING
GOVERNOR DIRECTOR
November 20, 2020
Martha Brail
Keane Center For Adoption
930 Mason
Dearborn, MI 48124
RE: License #: CB820201219
Keane Center For Adoption
930 Mason
Dearborn, MI 48124
Dear Ms. Brail:
Attached is the Renewal Inspection Report for the above referenced facility completed on
November 19, 2020. Due to the violations, a written corrective action plan is required.
The plan is due 15 days from the date of this letter and must include the following:
 How compliance with each citation will be achieved.
 Who is directly responsible for implementing the corrective action for each
licensing statute and rule
 Specific time frames for each citation as to when the correction will be
completed or implemented.
 How continuing compliance will be maintained once compliance is
achieved.
 The signature of the responsible party and a date.
Please review the enclosed documentation for accuracy and contact me with any
questions. In the event that I am not available and you need to speak to someone
immediately, please contact the area manager, Linda Tansil at (248) 975-5053.
Sincerely,
Deborah Will, Licensing Consultant
MDHHS\Division of Child Welfare Licensing
4th Floor, Suite 4B
51111 Woodward Avenue
Pontiac, MI 48342
(248) 860-4532/enclosure
P.O. BOX 30650  LANSING, MICHIGAN 48909
www.michigan.gov  (517) 335-1980

III. DESCRIPTION OF FINDINGS
1.) The facility is in compliance with all applicable licensing statutes and rules
except for the following:
R 400.12203 Financial stability.
(1) An agency shall initially and annually develop and
implement a plan of financing for the operation of the
agency in carrying out its programs and meeting the
requirements for licensing. A plan of financing shall include
all of the following:
(e) An audit of all financial accounts conducted annually
by an independent certified public accountant not
administratively related to the agency. A copy of the audit
shall be available to the department upon request.
The agency provided their annual budget. However, no annual
audit had been conducted by an independent CPA.
R 400.12212 Personnel records.
(2) The personnel record shall contain all of the following
information before employment may occur:
(e) A record of any convictions other than minor traffic
violations from either of the following:
(i) The Michigan state police or the equivalent state or
Canadian provincial law enforcement agency where the
person usually resides.
One of one new social service worker did not have an ichat prior
to employment.
2.) This is a non-contracted agency and therefore not required to follow ISEP
requirements.
3.) This is a non-contracted agency and therefore not required to follow MDHHS policy.
4

IV. TECHNICAL ASSISTANCE
R 400.12206 Staff qualifications (2) An agency’s policy on staff qualifications
shall state all of the following: (a) A person who has unsupervised contact with
children may not have been convicted of either of the following (i) Child abuse
or neglect; (ii) A felony involving harm or threatened harm to an individual
within the 10 years immediately preceding the date of hire. To assure this on an
ongoing basis, it is recommended that ichats and central registry clearances be run
annually for all applicable staff and maintained in the employee file.
V. EVALUATION OF RENEWAL PERIOD
The agency is moving its office to another location in early 2021. The new
address is 933 N Melborn, Dearborn 48128. An application was sent to DCWL
identifying the change. After the move, I will tour the new office either in
person or virtually due to COVID-19 restrictions.
There were no licensing rule violations at the Interim Inspection in 2019 and
no DCWL investigations during this licensing period.
VI. RECOMMENDATION
Based on inspection findings the facility is not in compliance with all applicable licensing
rules. Upon receipt of an acceptable corrective action plan, it is recommended that the
facility will be issued a renewal of their regular license.
November 20, 2020
________________________________________
Deborah Will Date
Licensing Consultant
Approved By:
Date November 20, 2020
Area Manager
Linda D. Tansil
